name: tasks-md
description: Tasks.md is a self-hosted Markdown-based task manager using plain text files. It offers a web UI to view, filter, and update tasks while keeping storage in Git-friendly format.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Store tasks in plain text Markdown files that remain readable and editable outside the application

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: View and manage tasks through a modern web UI with filtering, sorting, and search capabilities

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Filter tasks by status, tags, priority, or custom criteria to focus on what matters most

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Organize tasks across multiple files and folders to match your project structure

features.title: Tag System
features.description: Categorize and group tasks using hashtags for flexible organization and quick filtering
